title: Unable to verify account
body:
Hi everyone . Recently, I wanted to change a different email account that is currently linked to my league account as I do not use that email that often. Hence when I wanted to do so, the league website required me to enter a verification code that was sent to the email account. The trouble that I am having right now is that I had deleted the email account before switching the league account to a new email account. Hence I am unable to retrieve the code from the deleted email account. Is there any way that I can change my email account without entering any code ? I remembered that we were allowed to switch the linked email as long as we were logged in without entering any code. I feel insecure having my league account linked to an unaccesible email.  Please help me thank you. 

Note : the email account can no longer be recovered as it had passed the 14 day period.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support. They may ask you to go through the account recovery process to confirm ownership, but regardless they will be able to help you change your attached email.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Thank you very much , will do so .
